choices: Trip and fall on the beautiful school president
1.content:
You're sleeping lightly at home when your wake-up alarm goes off and sit up, quickly turning it off. Standing up you streach and go into your bathroom and take a shower. Standing in front of the mirror you adjust your bra and smooth your skirt. Staring at your face in the mirror you are worried that you have a bit of shadow on your face. Quickly you remove it, leaveing your face perfectly smooth.
"I hope nobody can tell that I'm a boy" you think as you walk down the street to your new school, Ayame Academy.
As you walk in the front doors you smile as you walk down the hall. As you continue down the hall you become aware of a lot of wispering around you.
"Whoa! Look at her! Who is she?" says a boy behind you.
"You spacecase! She's the new girl, of cource." another boy tells him.
"Wow! Check out that long hair. It's so gorgeous!" says someone else
"She's got nice hair, but her legs are even better!" this time it was a girl speaking.
What happens next?
You...
1.title: Getting ready

choices: you take his hand and he helps you up
14.content:
As you near a corner you glance over your shoulder. You are so shocked to see that the hallway behind you is full of students watching you intently and wispering among themselves. Still looking over your shoulder, you turn the corner and run into another student. The other student falls on the floor and you fall on top of him. A sudden hush fills the corridor.
"Mmff" a voice says from under you "Well, since I wasn't fully awake I guess I am now. Are you hurt at all?"
You open you eyes and find yourself looking at one of the most beautiful boy you have ever seen. He has freckeled nut-brown skin, dark red hair, and brillant blue-green eyes.
"Umm...Hello. Are you okay?" he says
"Huh?" you ask "Oh, uh...umm, me? umm...I-I-I'm fine. yeah, I'm great. Ah, you probably me off you now."
Very red in the face you scramble off the boy and start to gather up your book bag. Suddenly a hand is offered to you. Looking up you see the boy you fell on standing over you.
What happens next...
14.title: Trip and fall on the beautiful school president

141.content:
"thanks you for helping me out" "I think youre shoes are untied
How do you know that my shoes were untied
I am psyhic.
141.title: you take his hand and he helps you up

info.brief_description: Welcome to Ayame Academy, New Girl. As the new girl everyone wants to get to know you.
info.description: You are a new transfer student to Ayame Academy and you are about to start your first day of class. As you get ready for day you are worried that someone might notice that you are not really a girl!
